attributes.action: Make carrying any size knife on the street illegal.
attributes.additional_details: This does not include kitchen utensils that are; held in tough plastic packaging/ unable to open without scissors.
attributes.background: The UK today is at its highest rate of standings today than it has ever been. Please help us to stop more people getting hurt by signing this petition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It is already illegal to carry a knife in public without good reason, unless it has a folding blade with a cutting edge 3 inches long or less. The maximum penalty for an adult carrying a knife is 4 years in prison and an unlimited fine. We aren't sure how you'd like the law to change. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/buying-carrying-knives

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
